feed.title: John’s Blog
feed.subtitle: John Palmer's personal blog. Like me, this blog a work-in-progress.

entry.title: I’m not a blogger…
entry.content:
Do people even call themselves bloggers anymore?

This is easily in-the-teens number of times that I’ve started a blog. But while I enjoy the set up of a blog, writing the content…not so much. Lately, I’ve been writing a lot for work. I was reminded of how much I enjoy writing when I do it.
entry.summary: Do people even call themselves bloggers anymore?
